shows.title: Young Identity
shows.desc:
Join Young Identity as they showcase work from up-and-coming young artists.

Young Identity is a spoken word collective from Manchester. They deliver dynamic poetry and spoken word workshops in art venues such as Contact and HOME, in addition to running projects in their local wards. They work with eager writers aged 13-25 years old, manage a popular poetry showcase and slam night, and are dedicated to giving young people opportunities to perform their written work.

Brought to Greenbelt with the kind support of Church Action on Poverty.
